N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 609.8 - Notice of hearings

State Regulations

Notice of such hearing shall: (a) be published at least twice in a
newspaper regularly published or circulated in the county or counties bordering
or through which the waters sought to be reclassified flow. The first date of
such notice shall be at least 30 days before the date of the hearing; (b) be published in the Environmental Notice

Bulletin and the State Register at least 30 days before the date of hearing; and
(c) be mailed at least 30 days
before such hearing to the chief executive of each municipal corporation
bordering or through which said waters flow, or other persons as the department
has reason to believe may be interested in the proposed
reclassification. Notes
